name: Distance_Check
description:
Game Made for TriJam#68

Created the game in less them an house. Using as much as possible only assets default to unity. 

Audio, and Hearts for the UI are the only exception. All code for the game is done in one script. 

Source code can be found here https://github.com/Ignisdeus/Keep_your_Distance

To play press space and enjoy.  

Post your high scores and see who wins :) 

only got 350.
